actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to discharge of indebtedness income from prepayment of loans under section 306B of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936.

summary.text: Amends Internal Revenue Code tax exempt organization provisions with respect to discharge of indebtedness income from prepayment of loans under section 306B of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to revise the effective date.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to discharge of indebtedness income from prepayment of loans under section 306B of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936.
